FuncDef: The display fwm arp slot command displays ARP entry forwarding information in a specified slot. The display fwm arp slot command displays ARP entry forwarding information in a specified slot.
CLIs: display fwm arp slot <slotid> cpu <cpuid> [ next-ip <nextip> { interface { <ifName> | <ifType> <ifNum> } | vpn-instance <vpnname> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the CPU ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4.

Specifies an IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

Specifies the type of an interface.
The value is a string of 0 to 28 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies an interface number.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 24 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display fwm arp  slot 1 cpu 0 next-ip 10.3.1.1 vpn-instance vpn1
<HUAWEI> display fwm arp  slot 1 cpu 0 next-ip 10.3.1.1 interface 10g1/0/1
